body_html:
@fferroni Can I please know how to create model_string.meta . The below command creates only model_string.index and model_string.data-00000-of-00001 files. .meta file is needed to do prediction as described in https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35508866/tensorflow-different-ways-to-export-and-run-graph-in-c

TF_CHECK_OK(session->Run({{"save/Const:0", model_string}}, {}, {"save/control_dependency"}, nullptr));

Is there any other way to do prediction in c++ without help of .meta file ?
